website_summaries.verdict: For anyone looking for a larger screen, high performance, and dual camera on a moderately priced tablet, this model ticks all the boxes.
pros: Plenty of storage space and a long-lasting battery
Works as quickly as a small laptop and is more portable
A great everyday tablet for games, reading, email, and browsing online
Not preloaded with a lot of bloatware
cons: Some think it's a bit heavier than other similar tablets
Have to keep an eye on charging cable to make sure it's working correctly

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product until it screwed up after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product until it screwed up after 8 months. It would connect to WIFI and turn it self off and restart over and over. had to pay $35.00 for shipping. 3 weeks later i received it back with the same problem. Asus paid for shipping this time. after 2 MONTHS i received it back STILL NOT FIXED. I once again returned it they agreed to replace with a reconditioned unit. 1 more MONTH went buy I received a New Tablet. Product works great when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Do not get the 16GB read this review and find out why
customer_reviews.text: The 16 gig tablet is useless, it comes with so much pre-installed bloatware that can't be uninstalled. We've had this for 4 months and it no longer has room for updates! While it's true that this does have expandable storage, it is VERY important to know the expandable storage can not be formatted as internal. ASUS has locked out this feature of Android. So to advertise this as expandable storage is false in my opinion. Called the company to see if they could help, no help and rude.
customer_reviews.author: Real person from Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Pro: worked for 1 day Con: after fully ...
customer_reviews.text: Pro: worked for 1 day Con: after fully charging turned off tablet. when started it the following day "nada", nothing. re attached it to charging cable - showed that it was fully charged. but still a blank screen. returning for refund or replacement. ADDED AFTER CALLING AMAZON: I received instruction on how to get it started. Apparently the factory charge and the first complete owner charge is not sufficient (not sure why). So you have to hold down the increase volume and on/off button to turn on the tablet. Bingo it starts!
customer_reviews.author: Azpolarbear

customer_reviews.title: Bad Charging Port
customer_reviews.text: The charging port failed before 6 months of use. Asus claims it is my fault when I have had dozens of devices with Micro USB chargers and this is the first one to break. I could have them fix the port for the same cost as buying a brand new tablet, but they will install the same garbage that already broke. Android is a great OS but these manufacturers stink and need to start making quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Major Fail.  Remove SD card during each update on Asus products.  Do not buy the 16GB model.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. First off, it uses 15.9Gb of the memory for system files, so you cannot load any apps or save any photos or videos. It is constantly saying that the memory is full and I have erased all apps, photos, videos, and cache. There is nothing left to erase except hidden system files, yet it is saying the memory is full. Secondly, when it did the last update, it ruined my 32GB SD card. Now the card won't read on any computer, all my files are lots, and it won't even re-format, so it is totally ruined.
customer_reviews.author: lilac

customer_reviews.title: happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: After dropping my previous ASUS 10 inch , Android 4.2 tablet and breaking the glass, I decided to replace rather than repair. After researching other options and finding them lacking one way or another, I found myself looking at ASUS again. I find them to be a reliable and frugal option.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Lots of features built in. Fast processors. Love the "Power and Boost" feature that let's you clear RAM and caches, etc. Use it mostly for online shopping, email, and social media - it works great! Second Asus product in our house and definitely won't be the last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime 1

customer_reviews.title: Good value... check that all apps work.
customer_reviews.text: Update- Bluetooth was fixed in an update. But either Prime Video or Netflix would not work. I don't recall which. I returned it because the refund window was closing. Too bad really. I ended up spending a lot more for a slightly bigger screen. ----------------------------------------------------------------------- If not for the Bluetooth problems it would have been great. But it would not pair consistently with either my Bose headset or speakers. And when it did pair, when playing Amazon or Netflix video, the sound would cut out. I have several Bluetooth devices. None of them exhibited this problem with my Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far. I use windows 10 and Apple tablets/PC mainly. I wanted to keep using Android also. Impressed with Android 6 and speed and ease of use, even when fairly new to Android higher level operating systems. No complaints so far. Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Klein

customer_reviews.title: but I was very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. I wasn't sure how well it would operate, as the cost was on the lower side, but I was very satisfied with the product. I use it every day for functions such as watching videos, reading books, browsing the internet, composing emails and everything I would have done on my phone - yet better. The tablet itself feels well built, however, I did buy a magnetic case which added to its bulk and weight. Nevertheless, this is an excellent choice and I am even looking into getting a few more to use at my work place and at home.
customer_reviews.author: AaronHarper

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth range is pathetic, I can't even leave the room wearing my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two main issues with this device. First, Bluetooth range is pathetic, I can't even leave the room wearing my bluetooth headphones or audio will start to stutter or stop entirely. This did not happen with my previous device, a Nexus 7. Second, soon after turning off the screen, Pandora will stop playing and start buffering, but only when I have the screen off. I don't install auto-killing apps and have uninstalled Autostart Manager. If you don't use Bluetooth or Pandora, then this would not be a terrible device.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Wieling

customer_reviews.title: You can do better....
customer_reviews.text: Ok, firstly this thing has low resolution. The screen looks fuzzy and the colors are muted. Think,  ̈Blah! ̈ Second, the selfie camera is terrible. I wanted to use this thing to stream video with students, but I don't think it will make a good impression. Before you buy, go online and read professional reviews of this model. Don't just look at it stacked against 9 other budget tablets (as I did). A pro review that I eventually saw suggests going for Samsung Galaxy A. Wish I had read that review sooner. Now I am in Brazil with no hopes of a return. Hopefully, it will make a good alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watt

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is borderline defective
customer_reviews.text: The battery life makes this almost unusable. Lost 20% power in 30 minutes of just surfing the internet. I can't imagine how one could even watch a full movie on this without having to recharge immediately. Also, takes about 30 minutes to recharge 10% power. Changed to one star. This is the worst ASUS product on the market.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome display and power.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my GF as she wanted something a little bigger then her Nexus 7 (that she still uses whe she goes out) and she loves it. The ZenPad is easy to set up and the display is very sharp and clear. As she is older and not very tech savy display was most important to her so she could play her games with ease. For me having more power then she really needs was more important and this covered it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Android tablet whose performance and quality matches other tablets at twice the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet with wonderful specs and performance at a very good price. I have had less expensive tablets that only had one gigabyte of RAM memory and they didn't perform very well because I was trying to save money. So this tablet performs as well as higher end ones like Samsung and even a friend's iPad. Especially the big plus was 64GB of storage and the SD card slot allows me to add even more storage. I have a 128gb micro SD card in it now. Would recommend this purchase to anyone that wants a good 10 inch tablet with Android but doesn't want to pay 400 to $600.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Tablet OK
customer_reviews.text: Terrible battery life for a large tablet. Worse, it charged extremely slowly. Painfully long charging times and bad battery life mean you will basically have to be constantly plugged in. If you bought this expecting to also purchase the official ASUS keyboard dock, with its extended battery, prepare to be disappointed. The dock is NOT for sale anywhere in the world. Asus basically made what appears to be a few dozen of them, they sold out, and that's it. Pure vaporware essentially. They continue to advertise that these docks are available, but those are outright lies.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin W. Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet !!
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting one of these tablets to be able to watch the news on the patio, without have to install an additional TV outside. I installed the Direct TV app and can now watch live TV without paying for the extra outlet. I use my home wi-fi but I also have unlimited data and a hotspot with my cell plan so I can watch TV virtually anywhere I want to. Beautiful clear picture. It does take about 18 seconds to boot up. I thought there was something wrong with it but you just have to press the "on" button longer than I would've thought.
customer_reviews.author: DLRogers

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is an excellent replacement for a Samsung Galaxy. The reason for the four out of five stars is because in many instances I have had issues with the WiFi connecting on the first try. Many times I have to reboot the system to connect it to the WiFi. That is the only problem I've ever had with this device. The screen color, brightness, sound, and the speed of the device is exceptional for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The art guy

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not charge beyond 1% after 1 month, YOU NEED TO DISCONNECT AND RECONNECT BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: Lived a month and now battery does not charge beyond 1% !! Terrible quality! When battery is at 1% you cannot upgrade the firmware to hope for a change, that's super dumb as well. UPDATE: I had to give it 1 star initially because of the issue mentioned above. But, if you remove the back cover of the zenpad and remove battery and reconnect it after a couple minutes it will work just fine. Did not have much problems with it after that. So 3 starts now.
customer_reviews.author: FFxt

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for media streaming.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet! I use it to stream Vudu and Netflix and to play Clash of Clans. Nothing very intensive, but it is quick and has a beautiful screen. I added a 128GB micro SD card so I can download shows and movies for trips. I use it to watch shows while running on my treadmill, so I got a good protective case off Amazon and a nice pair of Bluetooth headphones to pair with it. My only complaint? I have a Windowws tablet that has micro HDMI and I wish this had it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal. Bought two for the kids, then decided to get one for myself to replace my dying older tablet. I set it up and quickly went through the updates till I had Android 7.0 installed. This has good response and speed. The wireless connection seems a bit quirky but this tablet is great for the cost. If you want a high contrast ratio screen, this might not be for you. I saw somewhere that these tablets do not support OTG USB. I can tell you that they do after upgrade to Android 7.0.
customer_reviews.author: MR. D from CLT

customer_reviews.title: Great product, if it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it till I discovered it lost all battery power when turned off overnight.Update. No responsive from ASUS. Now it won't stay charge while asleep. I see on google this is a common asus problem. They should address it and I also read the batteries die after 1 or 2 years. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Maven

customer_reviews.title: I have had ASUS before over 5 years and they are a good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built unit , I have dropped it a few ttimes and its survived ( knock on wood) I bought Samsung for the for forty dollars more and drop it once , from a lower distance and cracked the screen. I bought a new screen tried to install it ; but screen connector was glued to board cheap cheap cheap junk!!!! I have had ASUS before over 5 years and they are a good product....
customer_reviews.author: Vern from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased and would recommend this tablet to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I have thoroughly enjoyed this tablet. It does basically everything I want it to and more. From watch movies to read to search the internet. It came with 6.0 Marshmellow which is one of the latest operating systems so I won't have to update it for a while. It also has an update system which my last Asus didn't have. It also does not have much if any proprietary software like the iPad does.
customer_reviews.author: Brad G

customer_reviews.title: Super fast, Android 7, and sharp resolution!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is by far the best 10 inch tablet with Android 7 that your money can buy. Excellent resolution compared to the lesser Lenovo and other brands within the same size and price. It can't be beat without sacrificing size, resolution, and OS. I had already tried one of the other "no-name" brands on Amazon called DragonTouch which I ended up returning because it advertised Android 7, 10-inch, and high resolution but it was crappy - you get what you pay for. This is the best $200 you'll spend on a speedy, smooth, and good looking tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the money. Does what it needs to for me. Advice: Set this up as a new device rather than transferring apps and things from another tablet. Dropping a star as just setting up took me three hours. This includes two online chats with Asus. I didn't enjoy the three factory resets I had to do either. I still can't register my tablet as Asus doesn't recognize my password. Actually the last of three password changes for this issue. But that's not the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Received defective product.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet was preset for visual impairment out of the box. Every command was read out loud by a computerized voice and it took effort to work through the set up process. Then after a few weeks of use, it started freezing while searching the web, and I returned it to Amazon. Rated based on beautiful screen quality, but slow response, which might have been unique to this table due to factory defect.
customer_reviews.author: EMM

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the money, bad camera
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our kids this year for Christmas (7 and 9 yr old). It has a kids mode which we have not tried out, as we use Google family. As expected was very easily set up and charged up before Christmas morning. So far, a month later, they are still performing as well as the day we got them. The only con.... The camera is really bad. Like it takes horrible pictures with both front and rear camera. For our purpose, it doesn't matter, but to others it may. As I can see it being bad at doing video calls and such.
customer_reviews.author: Travis R

customer_reviews.title: Bright & sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I keep the ZenPad next to my recliner so I can look things up on the internet for quick reference. The display is bright and sharp. It plays video from YouTube etc. without "freezing", and even though the built in speakers are obviously small the sound is decent. Comes with Google Chrome browser pre-installed. I use Firefox on my desktop, but the Chrome is similar enough that I had no issues switching over. I'm sure you could get something "racier" for more money, but I feel I got a good value in the ASUS.
customer_reviews.author: 72ndscale

customer_reviews.title: A lot of tablet for the price. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of tablet for the price. I was after at least 1.5GB RAM, 64GM ROM and 7+" display. This fits the bill. ASUS has also released Android 7 for it. My primary uses are: 1. Interfacing to my DSLR via USB so that I can control it and retrieve images. 2. Playing Android version of board games, especially with friends and family. 3. Watching/Streaming videos. For these it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: jwernerny

customer_reviews.title: It has good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift to replace my Lenovo 10" tab. Considering my previous tablet was of a flagship statue, I was shocked that I preferred this Asus. It has good battery life. The display could use some improvement but its okay. The camera is horrible but I don't need it so I don't care. I hate that there is no companion keyboard or avtive stylus; I've seen mixed reviews on Asus stylus that say they are compatible but aren't. Those extras are what I am missing most. Other than that its great, I'd recommend it for casual personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Britst

customer_reviews.title: Good pad for the price, better than IPAd mini. Issue with loose usb charging port.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the pad for 9 months and now am dealing with a loose charging port. Tried various cables but the problem seems to be the pad's usb port. Not looking forward to ASUS repair under warranty will update afterward. A decent pad for the price. Just remember very few choices for protective cases.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. S

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth and Video streaming issues
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth drops speaker connection 2 or 3 times a week. Streaming web base video (MSNBC CNN) stops in Chrome and Firefox every couple of hours.. must reboot to resolve whatever the issue is. Other than than, it's a great beside alarm clock. Update: After 10+ months of use. I have decided it is too buggy (BT, volume control, networking...), OS and Hardware. Will root and install a real OS, Linux. OK Google?
customer_reviews.author: R Saulnier

customer_reviews.title: Wifi Issues
customer_reviews.text: Well if it wasn't for it's very poor wifi performance, it would have been a nice tablet, but like others have said, it drops WiFi a lot! And I compared it with the older tablet that I was trying to replace, the old one did not do this in the same exact location, so it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: RL.

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this. Less than 4 months and stuck in a boot loop (google and it is a common problem). Online tech support did nothing other than try to reboot in recovery (which I had already tried). Serial number needed for RMA. If I cannot get into, how do I get? (no I did not save box for 4 months...my bad). He stated possibly they would issue if I called but will delay process. Needless to say I will not be purchasing Asus products on Black Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Nonomous

customer_reviews.title: Fast android tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable android tablet. Fast and lets my 3 year old "play" ABCMouse. If you are planning on getting this tablet for a child, I recommend the app "Kid's shell" It "locks" off unwanted features unless you enter a password or solve a simple multiplication problem.
customer_reviews.author: Evan R. Evans

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty much my first tablet I purchased so I'm happy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much my first tablet I purchased so I'm happy but if your looking for good resolutions for a screen go for something else because I tried playing 4k videos on YouTube and the resolution only goes to 720p that's it, the sound is great it is the black strand across the top of the tablet. But the camera sucks, if you wanna record video with your tablet try one that is 280p and darkens ur face when ur in a sunny area, but for a first tablet I like it! I'm on my phone slots on YouTube and social media apps on a lgg5 so a large screen is much better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Premium Look And Feel
customer_reviews.text: Decent tablet for the price. Can handle apps and games without any problem. Couple of issue you might not like, the camera is the worst quality I've ever seen and the volume is lacking. The good thing is most people don't use the camera on a tablet so you might not even notice that. Overall it's well worth the money. Has a premium look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: LaTonya Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. It will randomly lose wifi connection (but will still show that is connected). Only a restart will fix the issue. I have tried router updates and static IP addresses and nothing works. A factory reset also did not work. ASUS wants it to be sent back under warranty. This would take up to 2 weeks to complete. This is longer than I have owned the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Use a different seller!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this at 1st. I got this in June 2018. Three months later it is not holding a charge for more than 2 to 3 hours. I got back from dealer called adorama camera. They told me it has a 30 day warranty and now it's the manufactors problem. If I had know this I would NOT have gotten this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Ten stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all the negative reviews on this magnificent pad! Resolution is very good for such an inexpensive 10 inch Android product. Links to my ZenFone 2 perfectly. Smooth screen movement and plenty of storage for everyday apps. Glass screen seems tough...no need for tempered glass protection. ZenPad cover (optional) has magnetic standby function. Extremely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Samplerman

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for those on a budget but doesn't have lots of memory.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. Just bought another brand and more expensive, but still go back to using this one. I listen to a lot of YouTube videos and the speakers are much better on this tablet than my more expensive one. Only problem I have is I have to continuously clear internal memory. Which with trial and error found out how to do that but it works great after you clear it. If you're looking for a tablet with lots of memory and downloading lots of apps this isn't the tablet you need.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Well here is an update as of July 15th my Asus tablet will no longer charge the  the charging port needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this tablet. My Samsung galaxy note 10.1 died and I needed a tablet fast because I was going on vacation and needed something to watch movies on the plane,I also do my banking and many there other things I use the tablet for, I hate my laptop. First this tablet didn't cost an arm and a leg, the volume is very good the lasts about 11 hrs so all in all I am very happy. I recommend this tablet and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cassye West

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet for a student
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for school. I chose to get a budget friendly tablet and focus on the processing speed and compatibility with google apps. The camera is lacking in quality but I use this for school so it's not necessary. Great size, light weight, and so far very durable. It's compatible with any Bluetooth keyboard which is very convenient. I can download textbooks on the kindle app, unlike a chrome book and write all my essays through google docs
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this tablet. It's easy to use. Service was very helpful too. While I was syncing it with my phone I did something wrong and the service tech was amazing. I haven't used all the features yet. Oh, one Downer though is the volume when I'm watching movies is too low but I connect it to my Bluetooth speaker and works fine. Still happy with my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. After a month of use as a student, I've never noticed it bog down. The battery lasts 2-3 days. Only complaint is the screen resolution. You will notice that its not as clear as your smartphone. If you can do with a smaller tablet, you should buy the ASUS S8 at the same price which is better in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Unit is unusable after less than 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: The charging port in the unit had been in total working order for less than a year, and now, less than 18 months since I purchased it, the tablet is unusable. I just hope someone can transfer my data to whatever I buy to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customert

customer_reviews.title: great products
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for 1 yr and 2 mths. I have had nothing but trouble since i received it. true i sent it to asus to fix but they did not solve the problem. i have 2 other asus products which have no problems, but this tablet is awful. Keeps rebooting to factory at least 3 xs a month. now it is saying all my memory has been used. Ridclious cause i have 2 games and 19 songs. afraid to put music on it because of the reboot problem. I lost all my pictures. I know theres nothing i can do now but i wanted you to know. repairman i can says there is board problem
customer_reviews.author: susan itterly

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for simple, casual use. I like the large screen size and use it for movies often. My only complaint is the volume isnt very loud. I use a bluetooth speaker or earbuds for that. Camera isnt great either, but since I dont need it, I cant really complain. Otherwise, I love this tablet. Very happy with my purchase. I've had it several months now and it works like new still.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Jay

customer_reviews.title: very nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: A really nice tablet with lots of storage and a great display. No compatibility issues either for apps or Bluetooth accessories. When I got it the display was super dim due to some extreme power saving mode, but that's easy to turn up. Great for saving videos for offline watching.
customer_reviews.author: Kishmei

customer_reviews.title: Dim Backlight
customer_reviews.text: The ASUS ZenPad is much lighter than my old ASUS Transformer. The image is sharp and it boots up quickly. The downside is that the backlight is often too dim to see the image well. Apparently it adjusts to ambient light conditions, but it doesn't adjust effectively. I have not yet found a setting that will maintain bright backlight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sinton

customer_reviews.title: Decent performer
customer_reviews.text: Camera is terrible for taking pictures. The speed of the tablet is good for social media and internet browsing. Simple games are okay too. The screen is decent and the tablet overall looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow eX

customer_reviews.title: but overall i am very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: i play galaxy of heroes and this tablet plays without fail .it runs smooth ,and is very fast with no lag in it at all .if you are looking for a game tablet i have not run into any problems playing final fantasy game as well v11 v111 iv .i just wish the storage was bigger so i would not have to have had a external card to hold some programs,but overall i am very satisfied with this product .
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A nice low-cost tablet
customer_reviews.text: It's my daily tablet. I play games on it, watch YouTube videos and more. It's good value for money, and doesn't chump out on storage(as in it has more than 16 gigs onboard). Great for kids & power users alike.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Finally works
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement tablet & it had to go back for warranty repair.Now it seems to work fine. Just can't find full Users Manual 8-15-18 UPDATE: It is working great now. Really good on battery life, clear screen. Yes I would recommend this to anyone who needs a medium duty tablet. Just with it had more Ram, but works great for my use.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ted Buehring

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. What I don't like is that it's nearly impossible to find the ASUS keyboard for it. I even called ASUS Corporation and was told that these keyboards aren't available in the U.S. <sigh> I ended up with a generic Bluetooth keyboard which works fine for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mrywidow

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this tablet today, and so far I am very impressed. The screen is clear and sharp. The UI is very snappy and responsive. It seems to be an exceptional deal at the price I paid. My only concern so far is the amount of bloatware that comes preinstalled. I have owned many Asus laptops, and this is just something they do. I am pretty happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this 0 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.text: Every day I had to do a factory reset because of authentication problems. I called technical support twice and that is what they told me to do. It fixed the tablet for a day and then the next day authentication problems resumed. It required that I erase everything and add in all my accounts again. I needed to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet, but it looses the connection to my ...
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet, but it looses the connection to my WiFi frequently and the last I checked, there was no solution. Many other users had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ryyah

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Used most everyday. The only problem I have is screen brightness overall. Even with increasing the brightness control all the way up, I would prefer a rather brighter overall screen brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nicholas Bykowetz

customer_reviews.title: Can't use...has a factory PIN THAT THEY DIDN'T SHARE WITH THE BUYER!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the tablet; it is certainly light weight...and well that's all I can tell you because I can't get into the tablet. It came locked out and needing an "android pin" that was not supplied. So unless someone tells me how to get into the tablet...it goes back. Well update: I was scammed by the seller. Once the Asus is used it's no good to anyone. SO BUYER BEWARE... Move past thinking you could get a real deal....nope all you got was taken. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY on this seller.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month of use tablet will not turn on, only battery symbol comes on the screen without the charger even plugged in to the unit. I bought this for my mom for christmas, I usually buy cheap ones every year except this year I thought I'd buy her a decent unit and this didn't even last a month, not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V

customer_reviews.title: Get this now...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for a 10" tablet. Compare to iPad that is $700+. Does everything I want and is not running Windows!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, mainly I read on them, but was watching a TV show this morning on it laying in bed. Perfect video, perfect sound. 2 gigs of ram lets it open apps fast. Really nice resolution for reading too.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy Odesskiy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pad. Good for reading and playing games. However, the battery does not last very long. The relatively large display must use quite a bit of power. I just charge it every 2 days or so with light use.
customer_reviews.author: The Man

customer_reviews.title: Basic but efficient.
customer_reviews.text: It is great for Android apps and to watch videos. However, you get what you pay for. It looks fancier than it feels in your hands and the screen is not as good as in the expensive tablets. Nevertheless, for the occasional media consumption, it is more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Not going to buy Asus again
customer_reviews.text: Tablet has been used average once a month......if that. First it froze and cant be used. Tried to reset Android to factory settings according to instructions and now the display failed. Can see it in the background, but cant do anything with it. I enjoyed it when i used it, but I think for a $200 tablet it should last more than 75-100 uses. I can buy one of those disposable ones for $50. I was warned by friends, but didn't listen. Listening now. No Asus for the next one. That's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. This was my first tablet so I have nothing to compare it to but I am very happy with this one. It's fast and responsive. The battery lasts a while and charges fairly quickly. I usually charge overnight and it's ready to go in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J.

customer_reviews.title: Happiness is ASUS
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this tablet! I researched. ASUS tablets, read all the comments, and talked to someone in the know... couldn't be more pleased. It was so easy to navigate and I will stick with ASUS!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Phyllis G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: NOT ABLE TO DOWNLOAD "PRIME VIDEO"  Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Everything on this tablet works great , Except >>> It is not compatible to download and stream my Amazon Prime Videos. VERY DISAPPOINTED . I have other ASUS products and all are compatible. What happened ?
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Below average
customer_reviews.text: Below average tablet that is priced double of good tablet. Example is RCA tablet is much much better than this at half price. Cons are bad picture quality, cheap material and takes very long time to charge, means very long time - not acceptable.....
customer_reviews.author: Real Review

customer_reviews.title: Battery? What battery.
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing and delivery was 5 star. Now for the product. Great performance. Did everything I need it for. 🔋 life is horrible. 1 star because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: It's Asus
customer_reviews.text: I have owned only 1 other tablet in my life and it was also an Asus. I can't say enough about this company and how they value their customers. This tablet is technology to the next level. The battery level is insane. I sat there just playing games and watching movies all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: No issues in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I have had this near 6 months. I am very happy with the tablet. It has stayed fast, has settings that make it more a pleasure to use (notification blocking and such).This item is purely for entertainment and it has worked perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Heads up about charging
customer_reviews.text: Heads up about this tablet. I had hoped to run it 24x7 to display some information as a sort of bulletin board. The very first page of the included user guide says that it is not designed to be constantly plugged in. You should only charge it and unplug it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A whole load of built in bloatware, but it works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: rhythm7a

customer_reviews.title: Really good pad...
customer_reviews.text: Very good pad, adequate RAM and storage, and is expandable. Nice picture, good speed, great size for watching your movie anywhere you want. My wife has been dancing in the street since I got it for her...
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Great Budget tablet but definitely needs more memory as you only get like 10gb available after all updates are done. After a year of ownership the tablets screen will black out for a second then come back, very annoying. Bought for basic video use and online researching and has definitely served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar the Grouch

customer_reviews.title: Slow....Slow
customer_reviews.text: First allow me to say that for the money, this is a so-so tablet. However, if you want a pad with some performance, do not buy this tablet. I purchased this to replace my iPad air, (I'm not a great fan of apple products). When comparing this tablet with the iPad, there is no comparison. This ASUS table is slow processing most everything. My Galaxy S5 does a much better job of processing data and surfing this internet. Processing video clips from the news networks is painful waiting for the file too open. The only reason I gave it two stars is the price. This is diffidently fulfills the old adage, "you get what you pay for."
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Good. Be better if you could update android on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: it's a great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Fast on and display, a lot of features to access almost anything a regular computer can accomplish. Least thing is if you move it around and touch it in a different way ,it shuts down and then you have to enter password again to continue. But, don't get me wrong, it's a great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Carolan Batchelder

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazon Seller!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Asus ZenPad --perfect for reading. The price was incredible. Shipped extremely fast-in fact I received it on a Sunday, which left me time to charge the battery up. Thank you for a perfect purchase. Bev in AZ
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M. Terhune

customer_reviews.title: I'm still figuring it out but I do like it. The only thing I don't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm still figuring it out but I do like it. The only thing I don't like is when I loose connection in the middle of a project and I have to start over again. This has happened at three different Wi-Fi connections in Omaha and Chadron, NE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, was what I wanted. It is fast and has great graphics for a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: RAA

customer_reviews.title: Charging port is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these because I really like the tablet. However, the charging port came loose 2 out of 3 tablets and the 3rd one I dropped and the screen shattered. Other than the charging port problem it's an excellent tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy T.

customer_reviews.title: Super Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the money. It is fast, and it is exactly what I need for work. I bought a bluetooth connected keyboard, and it is an amazing product when combined with that. I really could not be happier. Every aspect of this has made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tlynnj777

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my mom and now I'm jealous. She loves it and it runs smooth and as long as she is an avid user (she's 82) it means it is pretty intuitive and easy to use. Very impressed, this is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Bayona

customer_reviews.title: Periodically didnt turn on
customer_reviews.text: First glance it looked brand new. Now damages or scratches visible. But within few hours it would turn off and could not be turn on untill the start button was pressed dozen times and then it got too frequent to be ok with it. Did not have loud sound either. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Fabdecor

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet for a great price, looks great feels good in my hands.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the material and build quality. The setup is easy, the sound is good the image is good and overall this is a great tablet. If you factor in the price than its an awesome tablet. Definitely a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Izak K.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Asus
customer_reviews.text: Great device, good price, great performance. Asus has always been one of my favorites, also for PC mother boards.
customer_reviews.author: enascimento

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: MET AND EXCEEDED EXSPECTATIONS. BOUGHT THIS TO SHOW CUSTOMERS OUR PRODUCT PHOTOS AND WEBSITE. CAMERA WORKS WAY BETER THAN EXPECTED AND WIFI WORKS SEAMLESSLY.
customer_reviews.author: HEY YOU MR. TALL GUY

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: This notebook sucks. you have to reboot constantly, as it gets hung-up all the time. Using it is an exercise in frustration. I always feel like seeing how far I could throw it. If I could give it minus stars, I would. Buy it if you are a masochist.
customer_reviews.author: J. B

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this July 2017. I'm still in love with this tablet. I use it for both work and leisure. In fact, I'm using it right now!
customer_reviews.author: Neptune Smith

customer_reviews.title: We have 2 pads from asus and we love them both
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 pads from asus and we love them both. The first one is old but still works and the new one works really well. Pretty quick, takes decent pics and it is easy to use and navigate. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: aintnouse

customer_reviews.title: Severely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So excited to receive this tablet. After several crashes when trying to update system and sending back to ASUS we finally figured out that not so speedy internet caused the crashing. I do not recommend this product not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great size but not compatible with my Verizon account
customer_reviews.text: Great size but not compatible with my Verizon account. Does not include whatever it is that will connect it to my Verizon account so its basically just a stand alone device. I can connect thru my phone hot spot but only a limited amount of time each month. Should have bought tablet thru Verizon and will next time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Craft

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED FOR KIDS
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tablet for my son and the Android System of the tablet doesn't allow me to create multiple user profiles. ASUS does not offer any support or help for this issue. I can not control my son, not to downloading apps or connecting to WIFI networks. NOT RECOMMENDED FOR KIDS.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tavarez

customer_reviews.title: Runs games pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: For 180 (after tax) dollars this tablet (ASUS ZenPad 10.1) is a steal. it's been able to run the games I've wanted to play so far pretty smoothly and it's large 10 inch screen makes for great visuals. I'm so glad I decided to get this one instead of saving up for a 500 or 600 dollar tablet because so far this tablet can do everything I want it to do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: FriendlyGamerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for price
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet for the price. Easy to set up, and copy all my apps from my other tablet and Google. Only issue I've had so far is one certain app blanking out for a few seconds occasionally, but it then restores without closing the app or losing information. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet. The screen isn't 1080p
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet. The screen isn't 1080p, but looking at it, you'd be hard pressed not to think it was. Excellent battery life. I don't use it as frequently as some of my other devices and have had it go two days or more without requiring a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Taguiera Irrenee

product_meta.title: ASUS ZenPad Z301M-A2-GR 10.1-Inch Tablet
product_meta.description: Style:HD| Size:16| Color:Grey| Configuration:ZenPad 10 (2017)ASUS ZenPad 3 10 inch 2GB RAM, 16GB storage. ZenPad 10 delivers exceptional performance with Hexa-core processor, 4GB memory and 64GB on board storage. It also has any-way-up USB-C 3.0, rapid fingerprint security, and high-capacity 5900mAh battery to keep the entertainment going.
feature_bullets: 10.1" WXGA IPS Display (1280 x 800) with ASUS TruVivid technology for better visual experience
Easily handle and speed up productivity with 4680 mAh battery, 2GB RAM, 16GB storage
5M/2M Dual Camera; 1 x microSD Card slot, support up to 128GB SDXC
Android 7.0 OS; Free 100GB of Google drive storage for 1 year
Powered by Quad Core 1.3 GHz, 64 bit MediaTek MTK 8163B processor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,127 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
